Work directly with me at Incresco across clients, product, delivery, sales, and chaos.

I‚Äôm building multiple things at once:
- A tech consulting business.
- Multiple SaaS products.
- An AI-powered platform.
- And a team that can scale all of it.

This role is for someone who wants to be inside that storm‚Äîlearning fast, thinking sharp, and making things happen.

You‚Äôll start by:
‚Äì Managing real client projects: docs, delivery, clarity
‚Äì Talking to clients, designers, engineers‚Äînot just shadowing, but owning
‚Äì Coordinating execution across moving pieces

And soon grow into:
‚Äì Running sales/BD experiments
‚Äì Helping us break into new markets
‚Äì Building pitch decks or product ideas
‚Äì Handling internal team chaos
‚Äì Thinking like a CEO

We‚Äôre a tech-first company, and AI is already part of everything we build.
If you don‚Äôt understand how tech moves‚Äîor don‚Äôt want to learn fast‚Äîdon‚Äôt bother.

This is not a passive internship.
This is a shot to earn your way into a leadership role‚Äîif you can bring clarity, energy, and action.

Who this is for:
‚Äì Fresh graduates who are street-smart and hungry to grow
‚Äì Those who listen more than they boast
‚Äì Fast learners who can adapt to chaos
‚Äì People who earn trust by execution, not by waving degrees

If you think having a fancy degree automatically makes you the right fit‚Äîthis role is not for you. Your background doesn‚Äôt matter. Your attitude does.

I‚Äôm looking for doers, not obsessed with how good they think they are.

author.name: Parthiban Sudhaman
author.info: CEO @ Incresco & Flinkk | Building Flinkk ‚Äì AI Ops Suite for Scaling B2B Startups | Product-Led Founder | Hiring CEO Associate (Operator-in-the-Making)

postedAt.postedAgoText: 5 months ago ‚Ä¢ Edited ‚Ä¢ Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn

content:
‚ÄúThere is no work schedule. You have to work till you complete the task‚Äîeven if it‚Äôs the next day morning.‚Äù

An intern wrote this about us. And honestly? They‚Äôre not wrong.

But here‚Äôs what most people miss:

We‚Äôre in a world where AI is doing most of the heavy lifting.
Coding, designing, writing, analyzing ‚Äî it‚Äôs all faster than ever.

So what matters now?

#Vibecoding. #Vibedesigning. #Vibemarketing.
The taste, the orchestration, the ownership.

That‚Äôs where you come in.

We‚Äôre not asking people to burn out. We‚Äôre asking them to care deeply.
To stay until it‚Äôs done ‚Äî not for the hours, but for the impact.
Because building something meaningful still requires obsession.
AI can assist, but it can‚Äôt replace passion.

We had one intern who stayed up till 3 AM‚Äînot because we asked them to, but because he was in flow. The deadline was a month away, but he said,

‚ÄúI‚Äôm in flow. I‚Äôm getting more ideas. I just can‚Äôt go to bed halfway.‚Äù 

The next morning, the team woke up to a complete feature. 

Not because we asked. But because he cared. That‚Äôs the kind of ownership that stands out.

Yes, we tell every intern, every hire:
We work hard. We play hard.
If you‚Äôre just here for ‚Äúbalance,‚Äù this may not be your place.
But if you‚Äôre here to build, you‚Äôll find more growth, ownership, and momentum than you ever imagined.

We‚Äôre not a chill job. We‚Äôre a career-defining phase. If you‚Äôre someone who thrives on building, learning, and stretching your limits‚Äîwith the right support‚Äîwelcome to our world.

If this resonates with you, we‚Äôre hiring. Explore roles at https://lnkd.in/gFvDbStP ‚Äî come vibe with us.

#AIera #StartupCulture #FounderThoughts #VibeCoding #WorkHardPlayHard #hiring

content:
Say goodbye to clunky virtual try-ons!

We‚Äôve all seen those awkward online try-on tools that warp outfits and leave users second-guessing. For developers building in e-commerce or fashion tech, realism has always been a serious challenge ‚Äî until now.

In our latest blog, we dive into OOTDiffusion, a powerful diffusion-based system that creates high-quality, photorealistic virtual try-ons ‚Äî no stretching, no gimmicks. Just upload a photo and see the magic.

Here‚Äôs why OOTDiffusion is a game-changer:
	1.	Hyper-realistic visuals ‚Äî Outfits look naturally worn, not photoshopped.
	2.	No warping or weird fits ‚Äî Clothes retain their original shape and texture.
	3.	Built-in control ‚Äî Fine-tune results right inside the system.

This is the tech behind smarter e-commerce, digital stylists, and AI-powered fashion content.

üîó Read the full blog here üëá
https://lnkd.in/gisHKPA8

document.title: Exciting Opportunity ‚Äì Join Our Founder‚Äôs Office!

content:
Never lose your form data again in React.

We've all experienced the frustration of filling out a long form, only to accidentally refresh the page and lose all of our progress. For developers, ensuring form data persistence should not be a struggle.

In our latest blog, our Lead Developer YOKESH K S explains how react-hook-form-persist can solve this problem with ease. By integrating this simple yet powerful utility, you can ensure users never lose their progress, even after a page refresh.

Here‚Äôs why you need to integrate this solution:

1. Automatic persistence: Save form data seamlessly to local storage with no extra code.

2. Effortless integration: Connect with react-hook-form in just one line.

3. Improved user experience: Let users return to forms without missing a beat, even in complex, long forms.

Read the full blog and learn how to implement this essential feature.
